content.body: Yeah, the `@` comes from Haskell and if my non-JS-specific thinking that we just needed a way to conjoin a binding and another subpattern held, I would've suggested that spelling (although maybe we'd still not want to because of decorators... but whatever, moot point now)
content.formatted_body: Yeah, the @ comes from Haskell and if my non-JS-specific thinking that we just needed a way to conjoin a binding and another subpattern held, I would've suggested that spelling (although maybe we'd still not want to because of decorators... but whatever, moot point now)
